title: Blog by Ernesto Vargas
subtitle: Hello. I'm Ernesto, I sincerely prefer to be called Neto. I'm a multidisciplinary person. Most of my time is spent managing teams, interacting with clients, managing projects, developing, and enjoying my family.

author.name: Ernesto Vargas
